description.lang: Smart Energy SwitchThe Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch is a low-cost Z-Wave appliance switch which can report immediate wattage energy usage or kWh energy usage over a period of time. It can also be controlled by other Z-Wave devices to turn on/off to save electricity when appropriate.With an unobtrusive small form factor, the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch will not block other nearby Ac outlets. It is available in both matte white and matte black colors..
